Blog.post: Alrighty then no one is online and my brother is so determined to annoy me... Tomorrow we have to parrell park and i don't want to... well someone got online i am gonna go and see if they talk to me...

I drove first today in class... I am listen to the song *Until the Day I Die* by Story of the Year.. they are a good band... for some reason that rememinds me... My mommy might actually let me go to Warp Tour I cant wait... Man people need to get online... Well kara cant cause she is in Ohio... I have been thinking deeply about something today and I need to talk to her... well i am gonna go again....

Man I was tired last night.... I got home and went straight to bed... my neck and back hurt today so I am skiping out on my swim party cause i have a few more years that i can go and hey i had fun last night with my friends... YOu could say i made a new friend kind of... Well this is the day kara leaves with brian... I am gonna miss her a whole bunch... I got to see Kristi yesterday... Man I miss that girl she is awesome... I gave |3ob0 a big hug last night sense i will not be seeing her untell thursday... well i am gonna go cause i have to finish getting ready...

On my way to the shower after I got some sleep I fell down the stairs... My arm got cut up really bad and my head hurts cause I hit if very hard... Well right after I fell my sister started screaming *Way to wake people up Lynette* and just kept yelling at me I was like * ok don't help me up i might just die here from a concussion*... Well I took my shower and i got online and my little sister comes downstairs and turns the Tv on and wakes up my little brother and he yells at her for waking him up... So my little brother tries to get online in the other room but can't because i am on so he comes and yells at me ... well i am hungry anyway so i am gonna go and eat and let my brother on i will update possibly more then onces a day now that i am starting to drive...Bye bye
I have been thinking maybe I should become a nun when I turn 18 maybe even 20 cause I have no luck at all cause ever guy I like likes one of my close friends or someone I don't exactly like...

I want to scream at Kara for sending me that song... I love the song but they make me cry cause I feel just like the song says... I hate having feelings for someone you don't want to hide but you just do cause you can never find the words to say... Well you people don't want to know this shat so I will let you go...
The dentist appt. today sucked major... my mom and i got in a fight on the way home... I hurt my arm today so now i have bandaids on... well this is lame today so i am going to go.

I don't know who is reading this but ok. It sucks being single cause I am scared I will never be loved. If I am not loved and I do not love someone by the time I am 25, I will become catholic and a nun. I stayed at Peepi's house last night. It was pretty cool cause we ate watermelon and it was good. Well there is nothing else to talk about maybe I will tell you about my dentist appt. I have tomorrow. Oh yeah I did go to the pool today and this one dude flowed my friend and I around. Well bye.

9 days untell warped tour I cant wait... I am really happy these days and on what I do carefree... but there is something that needs to be helped... It is really scary and I dont know what is going to happen all I know is that if it is true it can ruin my whole life...well i am gonna go and get washed up bye bye

Ok I am offically bored and it is almost 11 and my mom and step dad are still out which is pretty strange cause yesterday my mom and him were fighting and now they are going out together... oh well ... little brother and sister being annoying pest and wont shut up cause kendra wants kory to shut up and he just goes blubiedy blub blub or something on that line... well kory left the room... no one interesting it on... kendra is now making weird mouning noises... ok now she is crying... well this is really gay... Where the heck is everybody... my little brother is now asking me is i would be friends with a gay guy... well duh...

Yeah July 4th not very much fun and i cant get ahold of anybody but oh well.... i am gonna have togo soon to watch the town fireworks down the street... well in a hour or 2 anyway but that does matter good bye...
Yay... Kara comes home today... I can't wait well I am not gonna write a whole lot today and maybe not until next week... bye bye
